H0.text: Which company first sponsored the big wheel called 'The London Eye'. British Airways

H1.text: Which company first sponsored the big wheel called 'The London Eye'. Coca-Cola

H2.text: Which company first sponsored the big wheel called 'The London Eye'. Virgin Group

H3.text: Which company first sponsored the big wheel called 'The London Eye'. Ba.com

A4.text: From the time of opening until 2008, the attraction was known as the British Airways London Eye under a naming rights deal.

A5.text: In 2015, the attraction rebranded as the Coca-Cola London Eye.
